mapper.sql: COLLECT_ID, COLLECTOR_CODE, INTERID, AMNAME, VOLTAGELEVEL, RL, TYRQ, BZ, YDBYQBH, TXBM, SORTNUMBER, DISORDER, ZCBM, ZJLY, JYFS, ZCXZ, ZCDWMC, XZ, ZBNUM, ZBRL, JD, WD, CITY, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_cj_bdz WHERE SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = '1'
AND INTERID =#{interid}
AND AMNAME LIKE concat('%',#{amname},'%')
AND CITY LIKE concat('%',#{city},'%')
ORDER BY AMNAME

select count(*) from t_cj_bdz WHERE SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = '1'
AND INTERID =#{interid}
AND AMNAME LIKE concat('%',#{amname},'%')
AND CITY LIKE concat('%',#{city},'%')
